description: Number of Abelian subgroups of the dihedral group with 2n elements.
comments: The rank of the fundamental group with genus one of the D_2n; cobordism category in dimension 1+1, with D_2n the dihedral group of order 2n. - _C. Segovia_, Dec 05 2012
links: C. Segovia, The classifying space of the 1+1 dimensional G-cobordism category, Nov 09 2012.
formula: a(n) = n + tau(n) if n is odd, (3/2)*n + tau(n) if n is even, where tau(n) = the number of divisors of n (A000005).
author: Ahmed Fares (ahmedfares(AT)my-deja.com), Jul 02 2001
extensions: Formula and more terms from _Vladeta Jovovic_, Jul 05 2001
